info.name: Nextcloud assistant
info.description:
This app brings a user interface to use the Nextcloud text processing feature.
It allows users to launch text processing tasks, be notified when they finish and see the results. The assistant also appears in others apps like Text to easily process parts of a document.
In the assistant, the list of available tasks depends on the available providers installed via other apps. So far, the [Large language model](https://github.com/nextcloud/llm#readme) and the [OpenAi/LocalAI integration](https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/integration_openai) apps include such providers to: * Summarize * Extract topics * Generate a headline * Get an answer from a free prompt * Reformulate
Once a task is scheduled, it will run as a background job. When it is finished, the user receives a notification from which the results can be displayed.
info.author: Julien Veyssier
